# The `Document` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A YAML <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/yaml/stream">Stream</a> is a sequence of Documents.

A document contains a root node.

Definition at line 536 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamlparser-h">YAMLParser.h</a>.
